Abstract: The Golf Buddy Voice, a tiny GPS device, measures the appropriate yardage on the holes of more than 40,000 courses and provides the information audibly and visually.
Snippet: The Golf Buddy Voice, a tiny GPS device, measures the appropriate yardage on the holes of more than 40,000 courses and provides the information audibly and visually.
LeadParagraph: Not many of us get to play with a caddie, which is too bad because it is a great, productive pleasure â€” the confluence of two trying to master a golf course together.

Headline.Main: A Caddie in Your Pocket, or on Your Belt
